mapper.select: select '강아지-자유게시판' as boardType, id, title, created_date, view_count from (select rownum rn, id, title, created_date, view_count from dog_free_post_tb where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and deleted=0 and user_id=#{user_id}) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1)*#{amount}
select count(*) from dog_free_post_tb where user_id=#{user_id} and deleted=0

select '강아지-자유게시판' as boardType, id, user_id, title, created_date, view_count, nickname from (select rownum rn, dfpt.id, dfpt.user_id, dfpt.title, dfpt.created_date, dfpt.view_count, u.nickname from dog_free_post_tb dfpt, user_tb u where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and dfpt.id in (select post_id from dog_free_comment_tb where user_id=#{user_id}) and dfpt.user_id=u.id and dfpt.deleted=0) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1)*#{amount}
select count(*) from dog_free_post_tb dfpt where dfpt.id in (select post_id from dog_free_comment_tb where user_id=#{user_id} and dfpt.deleted=0)

select '강아지-자유게시판' as boardType, id, user_id, title, created_date, view_count, nickname from (select rownum rn, dfpt.id, dfpt.user_id, dfpt.title, dfpt.created_date, dfpt.view_count, u.nickname from dog_free_post_tb dfpt, user_tb u where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and dfpt.id in (select post_id from dog_free_post_like_tb where user_id=#{user_id}) and dfpt.user_id=u.id and dfpt.deleted=0) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1)*#{amount}
